content.html: This log4j exploit = remote code execution in basically everything Arbitrary code execution in iCloud, Twitter, Steam, CloudFlare, Amazon, Tesla, Baidu, Tencent This may well be devastating 0day RCE exploit that has ever been dropped in all of history. github.com/YfryTchsGD/Log…
content.value:
This log4j exploit = remote code execution in basically everything

Arbitrary code execution in iCloud, Twitter, Steam, CloudFlare, Amazon, Tesla, Baidu, Tencent

This may well be devastating 0day RCE exploit that has ever been dropped in all of history.
